history.proof: intros A B C H1 H2. unfold lt_depth. unfold lt_depth in H2. scongruence depth: 3.

ctx: intros A B C H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment L : Language A, B, C : Formula H1 : depth B = depth A H2 : depth B < depth C Unable to unify "depth B < depth C" with "depth A < depth B".

ctx: intros A B C H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros A B C H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment L : Language A, B, C : Formula H1 : depth B = depth A H2 : depth B < depth C Unable to unify "depth B = depth A" with "depth B < depth C".

original: intros A B C H1 H2. unfold lt_depth. unfold lt_depth in H2. simpl in H2. apply Nat.lt_trans with (depth B). - apply H2. - apply H1.
